text_block_list.name: Young Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Father, wait right there! I'll zoom over<n>really fast! Ready, go!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: (I loved running. I think... I probably<n>always did.)

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
(Even then, I knew it wasn't forever.<n>The only course I'd
ever run was a<n>little path through a walled-off garden.<n>The
only goal I'd ever cross was the<n>line of clovers at the
edge.)

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: (And that was enough for me. Iwasn't un happy.)

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
"The challenge of your dreams... Go<n>all out... for your
moment in the<n>spotlight." Oh, wow! Everything looks<n>so
amazing!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
"All at the Japan Umamusume<n>Training Center Academy!"
...I wish I<n>could go!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: (This is ... what I wanted.)

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Ah! Y-you surprised me. Um, can I<n>help you? You look rather
scary.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'll bet. I've had a long, hard think<n>about Fine's
situation—about her<n>responsibilities to the people she<n>
serves—and my own responsibilities<n>to those I teach.
choice_data_list:
I'd like to know how you feel about your
studies.

I'd like to know how you feel about your
studies.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
How I feel about them? As in... what<n>you asked before?
Whether I'm<n>satisfied with the experience I'm<n>getting?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Well, I think... I already said I am.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
I appreciate your concern, of course!<n>It's just that... my life
is on a<n>completely different track from the<n>other
Umamusume here.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
My duty is to bring peace and<n>prosperity to the land that
welcomed<n>my house. That is my calling, my<n>pride, and
why I am here, broadening<n>my horizons.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Does that make sense? I wasn't<n>raised to be a runner.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There's a gentle smile plastered<n>across her face, but her
words don't<n>match it. I'm not giving up yet.
choice_data_list: I'm asking what you want, not what you've been told to do.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I already knew about her royallineage and the duties she bears. Iunderstand that her studies suit herstation, but they don't suit her!
choice_data_list:
It's not enough of a reason to give up on your
dreams!

It's not enough of a reason to give up on your
dreams!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: My...

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: My... dreams?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After that, Fine Motion goes quiet,<n>and I let her be. I think...
maybe she<n>just needs a chance to be herself.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And to that end...

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: What? You want me to race Fine for<n>"practice"?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
Your memory's worse than your<n>grandma's PC. I'm not
repeating<n>myself again. Piss off with the<n>lukewarm
goody-two-shoes act!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: ...Oh yeah?

text_block_list.name: Security Captain
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, I must ask that you give Her<n>Highness's safety
due consideration.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Heh, they've got you marked.

text_block_list.name: Security Captain
text_block_list.text:
At risk of sounding rude, I think you<n>fail to see the gravity of
your proposal.<n>You are knowingly exposing a<n>dignitary to
danger.

text_block_list.name: Security Captain
text_block_list.text: If anything happened to her, youwould lose everything.
choice_data_list:
I understand and am prepared to accept that
risk.

text_block_list.name: Security Captain
text_block_list.text:
...No, you do not "understand"! As<n>captain of her security, I
must do all in<n>my power to prote—
choice_data_list: And as a trainer, I have to support her dreams!
And as a trainer, I have to support her dreams!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Tch... Shut up, both of you!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: ...Now. First things first—when's the<n>scrimmage?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Captain... You're sure? You'll really<n>let me run? Practice or
not, it's still a<n>race.

text_block_list.name: Security Captain
text_block_list.text:
The trainer is willing to bet their<n>livelihood to help you pursue
your<n>goals. With respect for that conviction,<n>and for your
wishes...

text_block_list.name: Security Captain
text_block_list.text:
...And as someone who has been by<n>your side for this long,
I will not<n>oppose your decision. Please, do as<n>you see fit.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: HEY! Are we running or aren't we?!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
This is your chance. Don't give me<n>your "I'm happy just
watching" crap,<n>got it?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: ...Shakur.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
The stands and the track are different<n>worlds, princess.
Don't think you<n>understand our passion—our<n>
obsession—just 'cause you watched<n>a couple races.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
So follow me, Fine. And stop playing<n>dumb. I know you want
it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Fine accepts Shakur's challenge, and<n>the two take off
running!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff...

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
(Wow... I can feel each step<n>reverberate through my legs.
The<n>scenery vanishes behind me. My<n>heartbeat is
deafening. And I'm... I'm<n>really running!)

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Hah! C'mon, is that all you got,<n>princess?!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
(Shakur! The way she's pressuring<n>me... it's giving me
chills! If I don't<n>hurry, she'll leave me behind! But...<n>but!
Somehow—)

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: I... can still... I can still go faster!<n>Haaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
...Heh, that's more like it! But I'm not<n>letting you off easy!
Hraaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Aaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
(Ah... I can't believe it. My heart is<n>throbbing. My soul is
screaming—go<n>faster! Go further! Run, run, RUN!)

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: I... I want to run too!

text_block_list.name: Fine & Shakur
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff...

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Heh. Looks like I'm faster.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Hehe... You win. Oh, I'm so frustrated!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Trainer! ...Thank you. I truly<n>appreaciate the opportunity to<n>
confront my heart.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
And... I believe I owe you an apology.<n>I wasn't entirely
honest about my<n>thoughts before.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: I... don't want to go home yet.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: I want to stay here and run more and<n>more and more!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her expression is brimming with pride<n>and confidence,
brighter than ever.
